step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades back and down smoothly. Focus on the circular motion.
Nicely done! Keep that motion controlled. Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Great job on the first rep! Remember to inhale deeply as you roll your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow.
Second rep is underway. Keep the movement fluid and controlled, focusing on squeezing the shoulder blades back.
Excellent! You're maintaining good form. Continue to focus on the downward and backward motion of the shoulder blades.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls, supporting your lymphatic system.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Inhaling deeply as you roll back helps improve oxygen flow and lymphatic drainage. Keep up the excellent work!
